title: Molecules and life
creator_credit: Anvil Films, Educational Foundation for Visual Aids and Peter De Normanville
brief_description: Outlines achievements in molecular biology which have revolutionised our understanding of the chemical and physical basis of life. Includes the structure of large organic molecules such as insulin, haemoglobin, myoglobin and vitamin B12, the joining together of amino acids, the complexity of proteins, x-ray crystallography, and clinical applications of scientists’ work.
